data.title: BPOCSRC Virtual Speaker Series with Pamela Ward Pious
data.meta_description: Black Panther Oakland Community School Virtual Speakers Series presents: “My Emersion Educational Experience at OCS” with guest speakerPamela Ward Pious July 29, 2024 12:00pm-1:00pmPlease Join Here
data.text:
Black Panther Oakland Community School Virtual Speakers Series presents:

“My Emersion Educational Experience at OCS”

with guest speaker

Pamela Ward Pious

July 29, 2024

12:00pm-1:00pm

Please Join Here

OCS Group E. Image taken from the 1978-1979 OCS Memory Book. Courtesy The OCS Project.

When Pam Ward, a young single mother, learned about the Oakland Community School, she gained invaluable knowledge teaching at OCS and as a comrade in the revolutionary Black Panther Party. She eventually earned a Master’s degree from Stanford University and has made a life-long commitment to the well-being of the community.
